title: Incident - Laptop Won't Boot
description: An end-user reports that their company-issued laptop is not starting up and is showing a 'No Bootable Device' error.

tasks.description: Create a new ticket in the PSA, documenting the user's details and the specific error message.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new ticket is created with all relevant initial information.

tasks.description: Access the client's documentation to check the age and warranty status of the laptop.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the laptop is 4 years old and out of warranty.

tasks.description: Diagnose the issue as a likely hard drive failure and arrange for a replacement laptop to be configured and shipped to the user.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly diagnoses the hardware failure and initiates the laptop replacement process.
